Articles.Content:
I built this little guy to investigate kethane on bop. It's mission was to get to bopish orbit, find kethane, and refuel itself for further Joolian Exploration.

Download (cart only)

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/14567061/compacto%20%28payload%20only%29.craft

Download Entire craft with launcher

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/14567061/compacto.craft

Requires:

MMI Kethane mod

MMI Sattellite pack

MMI Payload pack (for launcher)

NovaPunch Remix (designed with v1.3.1.0)

Cart 1.3.3

Mechjeb (latest)

Edited October 1, 2012 by nhnifong

This rover is really cool, but I can't seem to open it. I have all the required mods installed but KSP is saying I'm missing MMISsatellitecommandpod and MMI External RCS Tank. Thats for just the rover. The launcher is missing MMI 2M ADP, MMI.P Fairing 01 - Side, MMI.P Fairing 02 - side, and MMI.P Fairing 03 - Top. Can you help me? Thanks!
Oay. After experimenting a few times, you need to add the MMI.S and The Payload Pack. Both are found on the same page as the Kethane mod. Sorry for the double post.
Hey you don't need the radial mechjeb since the pod is a mechjeb also

Hey you don't need the radial mechjeb since the pod is a mechjeb also

I think it looks cuter with the radial version on.

Like a robotic dog, sniffing for kethane.

Err Sorry I made this on my KSP which has just about every mod i know of installed on it.

I tried to recall from the picture which mods were used in that rover. I must have missed some stuff. And as for the launcher, Oh god I don't even know where those parts came from.

Err Sorry I made this on my KSP which has just about every mod i know of installed on it.

I tried to recall from the picture which mods were used in that rover. I must have missed some stuff. And as for the launcher, Oh god I don't even know where those parts came from.

I think my record was 11 mods on 1 rocket...

It was totally awesome, though
